about.bio: Boris is a web developer working at Forbes. Video Hub App is a side-project created with Electron and Angular. {intl_donated} of every sale of this software is donated to the {intl_amf}, a top-rated charity by {intl_givewell}.
about.creator: Creator of
about.p1: Donations go to the {intl_amf} (AMF) because it is a top-rated charity by {intl_givewell}, an independent charity evaluator. Every $2 given to AMF protects two people from malaria for 3-4 years.
about.p2: Boris has been giving at least 10% of his income to the most cost-effective charities (see {intl_givewell}) since 2011. Sales from this software will provide additional donations to his favorite charity.
about.title: About

blog.donation_text: {intl_donated} from every purchase goes to the {intl_amf}, a top-rated charity by {intl_givewell}.

contact.heading: Questions? Comments? Feature request? Bug reports?
contact.reason: Please choose reason for reaching out:
contact.title: Contact

download.after_text: You will be taken to your download page as well as emailed a link to the download. For at least a year from your initial purchase you will be able to download the latest version of the software at any time. If you lose the link, just contact me.
download.paying_text: All payments are processed by {intl_stripe} or {intl_paypal} with the checkout process handled by {intl_chec}.
download.title: Download
download.whypay_text: I want more people to be able to use the software, so the price is lower than it should be, but I also want to make the world a better place, so {intl_donated} from every purchase goes to the {intl_amf}, a top-rated charity by {intl_givewell}. Please consider paying as much as you think appropriate.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q2: How do I create a new hub?
faq.q3: What happens to my video files?
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions | FAQ

general.description: Browse, search, and organize your videos
general.title: Video Hub App

givewell.q1: Focus on a program with excellent evidence of effectiveness and cost-effectiveness.
givewell.q2: Processes for ensuring that nets reach their intended recipients and monitoring whether they remain in homes and in good condition over the long-term.
givewell.q3: Room for more funding – we believe AMF will be able to use additional funds to deliver additional nets.
givewell.q4: Transparency – AMF shares significant information about its work with us and we are able to closely follow and understand its work.

home.every_os: Works the same way no matter what OS you use
home.feature1_text: Hover over the thumbnail to see screenshots
home.feature2_text: Filmstrip shows screenshots from each video
home.feature3_text: All screenshots from each video at once
home.feature4_text: Add any combination of search options to find what you want
home.feature5_text: Rename, add tags, stars, and description to any video
home.like_youtube: Think of it like YouTube for videos on your computer
home.step1_text: from your computer, external hard drive, or network drive
home.step2_text: number and size of screenshots and clips
home.step3_text: start browsing even while screenshots are generated
home.tagline: Browse, search, and organize your videos

notfound.pleasevisit: Please visit one of these pages:

reviews.gigazine: easily manage large number of movies
reviews.softpedia: a quick, stylish way to manage video content on your computer

share.heading: If you like the app
share.thankyoutext: Promoting the app is a skill of its own and companies spend a lot of money on it. I am a single developer and would sincerely appreciate if you share the word about my app
share.title: Share
